review.title: Not easy to find the location
review.reviewText:
Linens very old
No supply of coffee or water after breakfast
Staff were detached

review.title: Decent hotel for the price
review.reviewText:
I was pleasantly surprised at the location.  In a nice business area and even though close to the highway, it was pretty quiet in the room. Rooms were comfortable and clean. 
My only complaints were that my room was not ready for an hour and a half after check in time. After driving 3 hours to get to the hotel I just wanted to go to my room and relax. Instead we had to wait in the Parking lot. Also the breakfast was very disappointing.  By time I got to the lobby all that was there was granola bars. Nothing else. 
I would definitely stay here again but plan to go out to breakfast next time.

review.title: quiet area on business estate easy access
review.reviewText: near busy highway but quiet and clean,nearby railway to san francisco $11 return easier than driving and parking 8/10
review.locationRemarks: easy access but nothing close by

review.title: No room cleaning service. High rates .
review.reviewText:
I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. Generally I have seen having atleast room cleaning service every day. But at this hotel you would have to stay for 8 nights to get room cleaning service. Moreover you would have to walk all the way over to front desk to get anything ( even though its related to room ). 
When booked from expedia be prepared for some issues. Like they front desk people aren't aware of how expedia payment works and they might argue that room has not been reserved.
review.positiveRemarks: Nothing as such compared to price

managementResponses.response: We appreciate you kind comments about your stay. It's great to hear that you favored our convenient location and excellent customer service enough that you would recommend us to others. Thank you again for your review.  We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Great hotel with great location
review.reviewText: Awesome hotel. Great location and great service.                                                    Would definitwly recommend to friends.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel had kitchen which was nice to use for making meals

review.title: Bad bad bad
review.reviewText: The receptionist said I couldn't check in without giving my work information...it was weird and uncomfortable. The bed was so hard and very squeaky! Carpet had stains. Felt like a Motel 6!!!

review.title: 2 star hotel
review.reviewText: We went to check in at 6pm the rooms were still not ready,  when we got out room they were already occupied with someone else in it which was very awkward when I opened the door.  Breakfast was not your typical continental breakfast only coffee, muffin and oatmeal

review.title: Basic Bay Area room
review.reviewText: Small, clean studio room. On request one can get dishes, coffee pot etc. No continental breakfast. No pool. Need car to drive to.

review.title: Its ok
review.reviewText: Bed and carpet smells like an old wet towel. Bed was clean and comfortable, room was clean. Just had a funny smell. Room was on the freeway side, traffic noise was not loud. Bathroom was clean and so were the towels

review.title: Trust Me... Do NOT stay here!
review.reviewText: While the hotel staff was completely pleasant and helpful, that is the only positive comment I have about this place.  We were supposed to stay for 4 days and we checked out after one!  The place is old, run down, outdated, our room smelled, the freeway is loud, the bedding was creepy... need I go on?  Save you $$$ and don't stay here.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff was very helpful and understanding

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Room was good it had everything I needed. Location and parking was easy to find

review.title: Super Bowl visit
review.reviewText: No problems what so ever. Warmly welcomed! Excellent customer service from Robert and Rubian...
review.locationRemarks: convenient to many food options, retail, major bay area sights

review.title: Great hotel and great experience
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and the staff was amazing.  We brought our two dogs with us and they accomadated them.  They had ample room to walk and play.
review.positiveRemarks: The room was nice and big.  We really enjoyed our stay.
review.locationRemarks: The location is perfect.  We were outside of the city.  We went to the beaches and to the bay bridge.  Also the golden gate bridge.

review.title: Quiet location
review.reviewText: Room was not clean, uncomfortable bed with some sound when u moving ur body , old furnished.
Good stay, clean room.  It's just not a good idea to check out earlier than 7 am.  Have to wait for someone from the laundry to help with the check out.
Close to mall and airport. Staff is very nice. Room was small but comfortable

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Needed a late night place to stay on a whim, this place was close and cheapest. We had a little trouble booking through Expedia as we booked online shortly before arriving and the reservation was not in the hotels system. The staff was very helpful with this problem and got it taken care of. The room was good and did the job well.

review.title: Ok for rest. Forget cleanliness
review.reviewText: Little dirty. Coffee n pastry, but not a breakfast

review.title: It sucked
review.reviewText: Heater was so loud we could not sleep. Pillows were as thin as bed sheets. There were no cloths hangers
One night for business.  The price was right, but I got what I paid for.
review.negativeRemarks: There was just something about the cleanliness.  Nothing overt, but it did not "feel fresh".

review.reviewText: The room was very cold even though the heater was on.

review.title: Nice but need to really check linens.
review.reviewText: Blood on pillow cases and bed cover...grossed me out

review.title: San Mateo Extended Stay
review.reviewText: Hotel exterior was attractive.  Room interior was OK.  Bed was very comfortable.  Towels were old but clean.  Continental breakfast barely adequate but not stocked well on Sunday.  Desk clerk was not knowledgeable and she was unwilling to communicate with supervisor for help.  Wouldn't recommend because price high for value received.
review.negativeRemarks: Continental breakfast and method of charging and reimbursing credit card at check-in.
review.locationRemarks: Don't know.  Night time and in middle business zone.

review.title: Easy parking, close to shopping
review.reviewText: One problem. Our room had a very musty smell. Got a little better with the cooler turned on, but never went completely away.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issues you experienced. In response to your feedback, we will review our cleaning and room inspection procedures. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.reviewText: Carpet was dirty and the counters were falling apart.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm very sorry that we did not meet your expectation. Please know that we will take note of your obervations and will take the necessary steps to ensure that your experience is not repeated. Thank you again for your comments. We hope that you will stay at our hotel, or any of our other brand locations in the future.

review.title: Old motel updated into tiny efficiencies
review.reviewText: This is not a 2.5 star hotel. It's an old Holiday Inn or the like with exterior doors, window unit heaters/AC, no elevators and a depressing courtyard. Breakfast is coffee and muffins in cellophane

managementResponses.response: Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention. The situation you described regarding your room is truly regrettable. We are very sorry for your experience. Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we work to ensure that rooms are thoroughly cleaned and inspected prior to guest arrivals. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback. We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.reviewText: Room smelled, shower didn't drain, no one at front desk for check out.

managementResponses.response: The staff and I read your comments about your stay with us. The situation described is unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. I met with the staff, and we will ensure that the housekeeping issues you mentioned are not repeated and we will be reviewing our check-in procedures. The staff and I appreciate your comments, as it will only help us to improve. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any of our other brand locations across the U.S. and Canada in the future.

review.title: I have a bad experience
review.reviewText: I'm stay on the office for 1 1/2 hour to get my key the room is dirty bed is so bad

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet our companyâ€™s high standards. In response to your feedback, I will be meeting with our staff to ensure that our hotel is fresh and clean for all guests. Still, I am glad to read that you were pleased with our friendly staff and convenient location. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

review.reviewText: Good location for professionals but lots of families staying cause noise levels and clutter to be high in the hotel. Also kitchen sinks were really small not really usable. But staff was friendly and prompt. Unpleasant cooking smells all over the hotel.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that we failed to provide you with a pleasant stay. Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we have met with our housekeeping staff to review our cleaning procedures to make sure your experience is not repeated. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.reviewText:
Room smelled smoky.  Bathtub not scrubbed clean.
Room smelled smoky.  Bathtub not scrubbed clean.

review.title: Non-Smoking Room smelled terribly of smoke.
review.reviewText:
One of the rooms we stayed in smelled terribly of cigarrete and cigar smoke. The only consolation from the staff were thinly veiled excuses: "The room don't smell like smoke to us"; "This is a non-smoking facility, therefore no one could of smoked in the room; or "We would of charged the previous guest a cleaning fee if they had smoked in the room, and as we didn't charge them a cleaning fee, they must not of smoked in the room".

Our clothes and belongings still smell, days after leaving the room. It was an awful experience.
review.negativeRemarks: The staff should of acknowledged the problem with our room, instead of pretending the problem did not exist.
review.locationRemarks: San Mateo Event Center.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I'm so pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable and that our staff was able to provide you with exceptional service. The staff and I are proud to have provided you with a comfortable stay. Thank you again for your comments. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.reviewText: Everything was just fine. Good facilities, comfort; staff is very kind and are always smiling, happy and trying to help you and actually resolve any problems you have could have

review.title: Great hotel to stay with your pet.
review.reviewText: Had my son stay there for a couple nights with his brand new puppy. Very nice place to stay. Manager Ms. Patel very nice and helpful.  Will definitely stay there again.

review.title: Dirty room
review.reviewText: There were long black hairs in my bed as well as on my towels and the carpet was weirdly damp.  Overall, bad experience.  Wouldn't recommend this place.  Really gross.

managementResponses.response: David - Thank you for the feedback about your stay at our hotel. I'm terribly sorry about the poor service from my staff on the day of check-out. I will be reviewing proper check-out times and procedures with them to ensure that your experience is not repeated. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any of our other brand locations across the U.S. and Canada in the future.

review.reviewText: They contacted me by phone and knocked on the door three times each time reminding me of check out even though I still had an hour to go.  they gave me the bums rush.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for posting a review of our hotel. I am glad that you enjoyed your clean room, your fully equipped kitchen and our affordable rates. Still, I apologize that our housekeeping policy did not meet your needs. Your comments will be useful as we continue to improve our guest experience. Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Small kitchen, Near Freeway Access
review.reviewText:
I live in town and needed a place for two days. This place was the cheapest, yet close enough to city.
PROS: small kitchen, inexpensive ($105/night), clean, laundry (not that I needed it), parking very close to the room.
CONS: it's a motel style place where doors are facing outside and anyone can knock on them. b/c it's an extended stay place, there's no daily maid service. you have to pay extra for someone to come and change towels/make bed/etc.

Overall: i'd stay here again. it's a short trip up 101 to SF, it's cheap. Although I'd look into residence inn and see how much they are first. they're rooms are nicer, bigger kitchen, overall nicer place.
review.positiveRemarks: kitchen, parking, location to the freeway was easy

review.title: Comfortable hotel close to the office
review.reviewText: The staff was very kind, I will make a suggestion: will be better if you inform that the rooms normally are not cleaned every day and if you want the room cleaned every day you need to pay extra.
review.negativeRemarks: More cleaning specially the odor in the rooms

managementResponses.response: Jen - Thank you for providing us with details about your stay. I apologize for the cleanliness issues you experienced in your room. I will be meeting with our housekeeping staff to review our cleaning standards and procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated. We continually work to improve our hotel, so we really appreciate your feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.

review.reviewText: The room was overpriced because all the hotels in the area where completely booked for a conference. The bathroom was not clean - had hair all over the floor and tub and the carpet was wet in the room. The beds were as bouncy as a trampoline.
The staff was great - the hotel and property was clean. I felt safe, but the doors do open to the outside; it is not a "contained" hotel.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. Iâ€™m happy to hear that you enjoyed our overall accommodations. Your feedback regarding our location is greatly appreciated and it will help us in our efforts to continually improve our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: We kept getting lost comeing back to hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was great. But we kept getting lost going back to hotel because you cannot see it from the street and no big sign that culd be seen.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I'm glad that you were pleased with our quiet location. Still, I apologize that your bathroom was not thoroughly cleaned prior to your arrival. I will be meeting with our housekeeping staff to review our cleaning standards and procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated. Thank you again for your comments. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: NIce hotel in quiet neighborhood.
review.reviewText: The bathroom needed to be cleaned before I could use it, other than that, it was a nice stay.

managementResponses.response:
Rob - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I am so glad that you liked your room, our staff's great service, and our hotel's location. I apologize that you did not find our staff to be accessible 24-hours a day. Please know, they attend the front desk from 7am-11pm. From 11pm-7am they are on-site and can be reached by the phone in the lobby if they are not at the front desk.

The staff and I appreciate your comments, as it will only help us to improve. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Good price for the basic essentials
review.reviewText: Small room, worn but clean. Staff was courteous and helpful. Grab and go breakfast scant. Low end hotel in a high end area.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to freeways. Nice walking area near hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Staff 24 hours. Exercise room. Better grab and go breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: allot of shopping within easy drive. Easy access to San Mateo bridge and the airport or 101 south.

review.title: Good experience
review.reviewText:
Stayed at this hotel for 7 days. Good experience. Staff was friendly and the facilities were good. Bed was firm, and the kitchen was well appointed.

Hotel manager was also good enough to let me check in five hours early.

This is my fifth stay in this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The price is slightly higher than other hotels, but it's worth it I believe, given the prime location and the safe environment. No worries about parki
review.negativeRemarks: You need to call in if you're going to check in late (like past 11 p.m.) because front office closes at this time.
review.locationRemarks: The location is excellent, as it's near Bridgepoint Mall, and not too far from the important destinations in Silicon Valley. And it's near Safeway.

review.title: Nice location.
review.reviewText:
I've stayed here at least five times now. Efficient and friendly service.

But if you expect to check-in late, best to call ahead to warn the manager (as the office is only open til 11 p.m.).

It's a bit pricey, but the location is great and the environs are safe and secure.

review.title: Just the ticket
review.reviewText: Great place to stay with a small pet. Save a buck or two and cook your own meal or two. Let your family relax with your visit and still not be under their feet. Get a great sleep and still visit family on your own schedule.
review.negativeRemarks: A little more choice of grab and go breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: For us near family, but also close to SF and all that stuff :) Half moon bay less than 30 min drive. Easy in and out on Hwy 92. 101 and 280 easy too.

review.title: Decent hotel
review.reviewText:
I stayed here after my apt building had a fire so I needed to move out for a bit. I didn't know when I was going to be able to move back so almost everyday I was asking to stay another night. The hotel was booked each night but the hotel staff was great on helping to accommodate me at the last minute.

The hotel is clean, has a big tv with some cable channels. Laundry is coin operated. Free parking. Close to Hwy 101, restaurants and a Target.

review.title: Free breakfast is a granola bar and a cup of joe
review.reviewText: Maybe I am just being to harsh, but when the site says free breakfast I have come to expect some for of protein, not just hot water and granola bars.

review.title: For the price
review.reviewText: The clerk helped me find the place, thank you! It's on the backside of a parking lot, not easy to find in the dark. The room was a good size and had dishes, pots, and utensils but I never found a garbage can. The biggest complaint I had was the hard mattress. I'll bring a mattress topper next time. Yes I'll stay again, probably every time I go to San Mateo for my class. The price is right

managementResponses.response:
Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I'm glad that you
and your small dogs felt welcome at our hotel. As well, it is great to read that you found your room to be clean and our staff to be very helpful as well as friendly.

The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Great for the price
review.reviewText: We travel with 2 small dogs. They were welcome and charge was very affordable. Very clean, nice staff. Safe neighborhood.
review.negativeRemarks: Wish it had a hot tub
review.locationRemarks: Safeway around the corner. Park with lake nearby

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I am so disappointed that room was not clean thoroughly, please accept my apology, Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will have extreme focus on room inspection to make sure your experience is not repeated. Still, we are pleased to hear that you found the rate of your guest room a great value

I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Check for cleanliness
review.reviewText: The room was affordable however it was not cleaned thoroughly. The wastebaskets had not been changed from the previous occupants.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It's great to hear that you enjoyed our amenities such as our in-room kitchen and the comfort of our rooms. We are constantly improving our hotel and truly appreciate your comments. Our grab-and-go breakfast is a new program to our hotel and we will keep your comments in mind for future updates.

Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Nice quiet location on weekends
review.reviewText: We just needed to spend a night when other hotels near the SF airport were booked. It's a 100% business area. Room comfort and cleanliness were OK, but too small for large families. Many smoking rooms available, so beware. Bring your own food if you want to cook. No stores nearby nor restaurants withing walking distance. Nice to have a kitchen and fridge. Advertised breakfast is a small table in the lobby with sugary carbs and no place to sit.
review.locationRemarks: Business district. Nothing within walking distance. Mall and restaurants on the other side of the freeway next door.

review.title: Last minute stay
review.reviewText: Needed a room at the last minute. It's not a terrible place...outside is clean, location is clean. Rooms outdated and not the greatest I would give 2.5 stars for the price and what you get

review.title: The breakfast really needs work-not much there and
review.reviewText: Many of the people staying at the hotel were living there. They did not have an ice machine which meant another trip to the grocery store.

review.title: Good for a night
review.reviewText: Good experince clean rooms. Good location. I recommend it. I have to write all this because they dont let me submit it with a few words.

review.title: Great and low price
review.reviewText: Great location with affordable rooms with everything you need

review.title: San Mateo
review.reviewText: For some reason the mattress was noisy, apparently it was new. The room was ideal for us as we wanted a good "home base" to drive to various locations. We were able to park with easy reach of the room without the hassle of valet parking which usually comes with downtown accomodation.

review.title: Very clean and comfortable and most important safe
review.reviewText: This is a great hotel it's very clean and cozy and comfortable and I loved it here. Would definitely recommend this place to others
review.negativeRemarks: The shower curtain leaks water out needs more protection!
review.locationRemarks: Very quite area good for people who love privacy and quiet

review.title: Modest, clean hotel
review.reviewText: Nothing spectacular, but a decent, clean facility with helpful staff.

review.title: Kitchen is in really bad shape
review.reviewText:
Bedding and bathroom were OK, but kitchen is in such bad shape, and to stay at an Extended Stay American, the point was to have a kitchen, so you can have a homey feeling and do some cooking.
My room has the kitchen opened to bathroom, but the worst is the kitchen cabinets are falling apart, and all the pots, pans are so old and not clean. Bowls are so small, couldn't even fit a pack of instant noodle, I have to use two bowls for one pack of noodle.
Enough said.

review.title: Economical but showing wear and tear
review.reviewText: Very cramped and dated. But it was cheap and close to the office. There is nowhere to eat nearby. Everything is a drive away.
review.negativeRemarks: small room, too much wear and tear

review.title: Good location, acceptable hotel
review.reviewText: Good choice for the price. Comfortable rooms and a good location. Would not put in the "great" category though.
review.locationRemarks: Good clean location

review.title: Slumy Hotel
review.reviewText: This place is very old. Dishes and kitchen appliances were filthy! No pool, spa, exercise facility, or ICE! The so-called breakfast consisted of instant oatmeal, coffe, hot water (for tea or oatmeal), packaged muffins, cereal bars, and mushy apples. The worse was finding hair in the shower. If I could have cancelled the reservation and stay somewhere else, I would have. But I wasn't able to do that. Thank God for Lysol spray and Clorox wipes. The office staff was amazing, and that made the stay bearable. Thank you Eric, Nancy, and Jimmy. DON'T STAY HERE!!
review.positiveRemarks: Eric, Nancy, and Jimmy made an awful situation bearable.
review.locationRemarks: Great location and quiet; near freeways and shopping

review.title: ok
review.reviewText: room clean, get wrong room, price ok............................

review.title: Nice Neighborhood.
review.reviewText: Well kept in a nice nieghborhood yet close to retail stores and only a couple of minutes to US101. Pet Friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, well-kept, quiet neighborhood. Pet Friendly.
review.locationRemarks: Quiet neighborhood near retail stores. Away from the noise of US101 yet only a couple minutes drive.

review.title: Not so great for our family
review.reviewText: We arrived late at night and the door was locked to the lobby. Had to wait for night staff. No big deal. But then, our AC didn't work and the sofa bed wouldn't open so we had to switch rooms. The staff was very accommodating with this switch. The second room had a toxic odor, I'm guessing due to the renovation. The carpet was new and smelled like your nose in a bag full of new rubber bands. Headache kind of toxic. At that point, we just wanted to leave the location when we woke up the next day. Manager said no - that we would be charged in full for all 4 days. So we stayed. Next, my daughter's shoe went missing under the bed and when I flipped up the bedskirt, there was so much dust, someone else's socks and some trash. Next, our key cards to the new room didn't work when we came in late the next night. When I went to get coffee one of the following days, I overheard one staff member tell another (in Spanish) "Here comes the white lady who can't leave." And they all had a laugh on me. I decided to keep it classy and not let them know I'm fluent. Overall, it wasn't t a nice place for our family to stay - and we travel a lot and aren't that picky.
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to highway and Foster City.

review.title: Great value
review.reviewText: The room was neat and clean and located in a quiet neighborhood.
review.locationRemarks: Very difficult to find

review.title: Great property suitable for everyone.
review.reviewText: This property is in a great condition clean on the inside and outside. Staff are very friendly and provide loads of information. The grab and go breakfast is awesome which adds a great value to the price. Parking is free and abundant. Less than a minute drive are 2 different shopping complexes with multiple food outlets/restaurants and a huge chain supermarket for all your extra needs.
review.positiveRemarks: Rooms are spacious with queen beds if you choose that option.

review.title: You get what you pay for.
review.reviewText: Location was great. Easy access to Rt.92 restaraunts, shops, parks, etc. Room could have been a little cleaner. Rate was good value for the area.
review.positiveRemarks: convenient location for my businees trip

review.title: Rooms to Make Your Mouth Water
review.reviewText: Due to the fact that these are extended day rooms with kitchenettes, cooking orders tended to linger in the room. Some kind of daily air deodorizer or air filter needs to be used in each room.
review.locationRemarks: Easy freeway access, but set way off main road

review.title: Good for long term stay
review.reviewText:
It is in a good location with good rate.
Offers full service kitchen, which is very good for longer term stay

review.title: Good for 2 stars, watch for bugs.
review.reviewText:
My girlfriend and I needed a place to stay for Maker Faire and this hotel was close and comparably priced. We weren't expecting a 4 or 3 star experience. I am using that as a guide for my ratings and review. The room was spacious and the bed was comfy. the courtyard was beautiful and the continental breakfast a wonderful addition. The only places where the experience fell short was in the wait-times at the front desk, especially when our key card failed, and in pest issues.

There were 3 foreign gentlemen with limited English who having issues with their payment not going through when my card failed to open the room door after a long day. I had to wait about 10 minutes as there was no other attendant. I'm a patient guy, and in any other situation I wouldn't consider this an issue; heck, I even work in the hotel industry and understand how things get. This particular instance however tried my patience a little too much.

Our second night there, we noticed a cockroach about an inch long scurrying about the kitchen area. We had already eaten, so luckily we had no need for the kitchen amenities, but it put us on edge as far as trying keeping an eye out. this unfortunately paid-off the following morning when we found many tiny beetle-like bugs in burrowed in our toothbrushes that had been sitting on the bathroom counter, and had to throw them out. We did not call to change rooms as we were really tired.
review.locationRemarks: perfect for fair grounds and on many bike-friendly roads.

review.title: Easter visit
review.reviewText: We got this room for the kitchenette. However, the room was surprisingly small. There was no maid service because we were only there 3 days. If we wanted them to clean the room, change the towels or make the bed, there was an additional charge. No big deal, but good to know. The front desk staff were very pleasant and helpful. They had a lovely courtyard with a large fountain, benches and a picnic table with BBQ. Nice. Plenty of parking.
review.positiveRemarks: They had a lovely courtyard with a large fountain, benches and a picnic table with BBQ. Nice. Plenty of parking.
review.locationRemarks: Nice centrally located to shopping, restaurants, and major highway access.

review.title: Local Hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is convenient to Foster City but it is not good value for money!
review.locationRemarks: Foster City parks.

review.title: Oracle
review.reviewText: Don't go during an Oracle convention. You may get kicked out of your room.

review.title: Nice clean room
review.reviewText: It is a simple alternative to much more expensive fancy hotels.

review.title: SAN MATEO
review.reviewText: It is Pleasant and Nice Stay .

review.title: Dirty socks
review.reviewText: The carpet, though not visibly stained," was filthy. Within minutes of walking around with white socks, they were black. The last night I stayed the vertical hold on the TV went out and I could not turn the TV off using the remove or the switch. I called the front desk to ask for assistance and they told me their maintenance guy would not be in until morning. I had to ask them to come to my room to unplug the set because the plug was down behind the dresser and I could not reach it. Luckily I was able to see the end of the NBA final game. :o(

review.title: Forget it
review.reviewText:
Do you want to start 1st day of your vacation in the bathroom with a plunger? This is the place. Well, that's not the worst part; the front desk was, to say the least very rude: "This is not the kind of hotel where we provide these-'fixing choked toilet' services"
It took 3 calls and 2 visits to the front desk to get a plunger. And another call to get a person to fix it.

review.title: The staff was attentive to our needs. We were made comfortable as best they could.
review.reviewText:
We were given a room which was still occupied even though it was way past checkout time. It wasn't their fault but the staff right away put us in another, bigger room. We thought that was nice.
We didn't like the tv though. It was rather old and would make loud buzzing noises while it's on. Perhaps it hasn't been upgraded because people probably don't watch that much tv anyway but still, I think it should work properly when it's on. Nothing fancy, just a working equipment.

review.title: Functional but that's about it
review.reviewText: These rooms were okay, if you're on a business trip and need a place to stay for a few days and need a kitchen during your stay it would be fine. I found the rooms were not very clean, the room didn't smell, but the cupboards were a little dirty and the trash has not been emptied from the bathroom. I brought cleaner with me and cleaned the room. The guy at the front desk told me there would be no maid service so i needed to call the front desk for anything i needed. i saw him later emptying out the trash and i think changing the beds, so they definetly should hire a maid i think that would make a world of difference. There was a nice little courtyard to sit and relax with a fountain which was nice, no pool, though. Overall it was a okay. Mall was nearby, grocery store and a starbucks.

review.title: Good for the price
review.reviewText: Everything was acceptable, weekly cleaning service included with room, so if you are staying less than 7 days, maid service extra. Shampoo available at front desk, which was not realized until first morning in bathroom. Kitchen and refrigerator included.
